txt.en: This scavenger hunt card has a list of things to find. They could be anywhere!\n\n<rgb=#00FF00>Unlike the others, this card can be finished by completing any ten of the eleven objectives.</rgb>
Year 11 Tales: Gollum
Swim in the Forbidden Pool
Visit TBD at TBD and experience 'Session: No Other Way'
Gather remembrances in Gollum's cave ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
<rgb=#00FF00>Optional:</rgb> Visit the Memory of the Ring-bearer south of the Camp of the Host and experience 'Session: The Precious, At Last'

Cards hang from the Party Tree. Each card contains a scavenger hunt to complete at your own pace.\n\n<rgb=#00FF00>Unlike the others, this card can be finished by completing any ten of the eleven objectives.</rgb>
You completed a scavenger hunt card!
DNT - TBD!
Search for the Precious in Gollum's Cave
DNT - TBD
<rgb=#FF00FF>Listen</rgb> to a gossip in one of the markets of Dale
Find the open shackles along the road west of Barad-dûr
DNT - TBD!
You think of the hungry days Gollum spent among the stagnant pools, and shudder
Completed scavenger hunt card.
<rgb=#FF00FF>Listen</rgb> to a rumourmonger in one of the markets of Dale
Visit the Stone-trolls' Glade in the Trollshaws
'On days of fair weather we let him from his cell, allowing him to climb a tree in the woods. An excess of kindness, perhaps, for he escaped us.'
'Whatever it was, it was not an Orc. It fled as soon as I touched the trunk of the tree.'
'Since we boarded the boats, Gollum has been lying on a log and paddling with his hands and feet. He follows us still.'
You think of the years Gollum spent beneath the mountains, gnawing on his misfortunes
'He came to the streets of Dale, listening and peering. Gollum's sharp ears soon learned what wanted.'
The memory is unpleasant, but nothing so evil as the Ring could be destroyed without suffering and sacrifice.
'Gone, gone! The Precious is lost!'

Folk whispered of some new terror abroad: a shadow that drank blood. It climbed trees in search of nests, and slipped through windows seeking unguarded cradles. Along the banks of the river, a plan was formed to catch the beast and put an end to its hunger.

<rgb=#FF0000>This is a Solo quest and cannot be completed with a Fellowship.</rgb>
DNT - TBD!
Completed

Every year in the spring, the Anniversary Scavenger Hunt takes place to celebrate a very special occasion.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Gossip
Find the cell where Gollum was held by the Wood-elves in Felegoth
Visit the Memory of the Creature at Garbert's Cottage to experience 'A Trap for the Creature'
'Fish may prove a perilous hunger, for the fish from this pool may cost the creature his life!'
Find the base of the tree Gollum climbed in pursuit of Frodo, on the edge of Lothlórien
To the Noman-lands
Swim in the Anduin south-east of Floodwend
To the Dead Marshes
Gather remembrances in the Dead Marshes and in the Noman-lands ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'They held him long, and set him loose on an errand of mischief. But his worst mischief had been done.'
DNT - Blah!
The markets of Dale are busy and bustling, and a patient ear might learn much
'He came to the streets of Dale, listening and peering. Gollum's sharp ears soon learned what wanted.'
To think these were the very three trolls Bilbo had told of, turned to stone while quarreling over how to cook thirteen dwarves and one hobbit!
DNT - Blah!
